content.prompt: The nineteenth-century beaded Bandolier bag represents continuity within the Prairie Style through its

choices.label: curvilinear plant motifs arranged with bilateral symmetry
purely geometric patterns created with two complimentary colors
vibrant spiral and star designs organized in a random manner
square fields, each containing a discrete abstract emblem

topic.text: 5.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Indigenous American Art

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
